verses.verse: And the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>sore<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to pass, when they had eaten <S%H3615%H398>up<s%> the <S%H7668>corn<s%> which they had brought <S%H935>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Go <S%H7725>again<s%>, <S%H7666>buy<s%> us a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>.

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H5749>solemnly<s%> <S%H5749>protest<s%> unto us, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Ye shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>, <S%H1115>except<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> be with you.
If thou <S%H3426>wilt<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> with us, we will go <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H7666>buy<s%> thee <S%H400>food<s%>:

But if thou wilt not <S%H7971>send<s%> him, we will not go <S%H3381>down<s%>: for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto us, Ye shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>, except your <S%H251>brother<s%> be with you.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore dealt ye so <S%H7489>ill<s%> with me, as to <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> whether ye had yet a <S%H251>brother<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> us <S%H7592>straitly<s%> of our state, and of our <S%H4138>kindred<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Is your <S%H1>father<s%> yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>? have <S%H3426>ye<s%> another <S%H251>brother<s%>? and we <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>tenor<s%> of these <S%H1697>words<s%>: could we <S%H3045>certainly<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that he would <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3381>Bring<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%>?

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H7971>Send<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> with me, and we will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%>; that we may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and not <S%H4191>die<s%>, both we, and thou, and also our little <S%H2945>ones<s%>.

I will be <S%H6148>surety<s%> for him; of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> shalt thou <S%H1245>require<s%> him: <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> him <S%H518>not<s%> unto thee, and <S%H3322>set<s%> him before <S%H6440>thee<s%>, then let me bear the <S%H2398>blame<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>:
For <S%H3884>except<s%> we had <S%H4102>lingered<s%>, surely now we had <S%H7725>returned<s%> this second <S%H6471>time<s%>.

And their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, If it must be so <S%H645>now<s%>, <S%H6213>do<s%> this; <S%H3947>take<s%> of the best <S%H2173>fruits<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> in your <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and carry <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6875>balm<s%>, and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%>, <S%H5219>spices<s%>, and <S%H3910>myrrh<s%>, <S%H992>nuts<s%>, and <S%H8247>almonds<s%>:

And <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was brought <S%H7725>again<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of your <S%H572>sacks<s%>, carry it <S%H7725>again<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>; peradventure it was an <S%H4870>oversight<s%>:
<S%H3947>Take<s%> also your <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H6965>arise<s%>, go <S%H7725>again<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%>:

And <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H7356>mercy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%>, that he may send <S%H7971>away<s%> your <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>. <S%H834>If<s%> I be <S%H7921>bereaved<s%> of my children, I am <S%H7921>bereaved<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2063>that<s%> <S%H4503>present<s%>, and they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4932>double<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>; and rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>.

And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, he <S%H559>said<s%> to the ruler of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H935>Bring<s%> these <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%>, and <S%H2873%H2874>slay<s%>, and make <S%H3559>ready<s%>; for these <S%H582>men<s%> shall <S%H398>dine<s%> with me at <S%H6672>noon<s%>.
And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>bade<s%>; and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, because they were <S%H935>brought<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>; and they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1697>Because<s%> of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H7725>returned<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%> at the first <S%H8462>time<s%> are we brought <S%H935>in<s%>; that he may seek <S%H1556>occasion<s%> against us, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon us, and <S%H3947>take<s%> us for <S%H5650>bondmen<s%>, and our <S%H2543>asses<s%>.
And they came <S%H5066>near<s%> to the <S%H376>steward<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and they <S%H1696>communed<s%> with him at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>,
And <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H994>O<s%> <S%H113>sir<s%>, we came <S%H3381>indeed<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> at the first <S%H8462>time<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>:

And it came to pass, when we <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4411>inn<s%>, that we <S%H6605>opened<s%> our <S%H572>sacks<s%>, and, behold, every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> was in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of his <S%H572>sack<s%>, our <S%H3701>money<s%> in full <S%H4948>weight<s%>: and we have brought it <S%H7725>again<s%> in our <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> have we brought <S%H3381>down<s%> in our <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H400>food<s%>: we cannot <S%H3045>tell<s%> who <S%H7760>put<s%> our <S%H3701>money<s%> in our <S%H572>sacks<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be to you, <S%H3372>fear<s%> not: your <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>, hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H4301>treasure<s%> in your <S%H572>sacks<s%>: I <S%H935>had<s%> your <S%H3701>money<s%>. And he <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> out unto them.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> into <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4325>water<s%>, and they <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H4554>provender<s%>.

And they made <S%H3559>ready<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H5704>against<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>: for they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they should <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> there.

¶ And when <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%>, they <S%H935>brought<s%> him the <S%H4503>present<s%> which was in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> themselves to him to the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> them of their <S%H7965>welfare<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H7965>well<s%>, the old <S%H2205>man<s%> of whom ye <S%H559>spake<s%>? Is he yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>?

And they <S%H559>answered<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> is in good <S%H7965>health<s%>, he is yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>. And they bowed down their <S%H6915>heads<s%>, and made <S%H7812>obeisance<s%>.

And he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Is this your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%>, of whom ye <S%H559>spake<s%> unto me? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto thee, my <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made <S%H4116>haste<s%>; for his <S%H7356>bowels<s%> did <S%H3648>yearn<s%> upon his <S%H251>brother<s%>: and he <S%H1245>sought<s%> where to <S%H1058>weep<s%>; and he <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H2315>chamber<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> there.
And he <S%H7364>washed<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%>, and went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H662>refrained<s%> himself, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Set <S%H7760>on<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And they set <S%H7760>on<s%> for him by himself, and for them by themselves, and for the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%>, which did <S%H398>eat<s%> with him, by themselves: because the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3201>might<s%> not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> with the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>; for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.

And they <S%H3427>sat<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>, the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> according to his <S%H1062>birthright<s%>, and the <S%H6810>youngest<s%> according to his <S%H6812>youth<s%>: and the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H8539>marvelled<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> at <S%H7453>another<s%>.

And he <S%H5375>took<s%> and sent <S%H4864>messes<s%> unto them from before <S%H6440>him<s%>: but <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H4864>mess<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3027>times<s%> so much <S%H7235>as<s%> any of theirs. And they <S%H8354>drank<s%>, and were <S%H7937>merry<s%> with him.
